WorkItem.Description:
The following graph, which is g.10.0.graphml in the test suite for QuickGraph (...\QuickGraph\Tests\GraphML\g.10.0.graphml if you have the source) crashes my recent copy of Graph# [the sample app, that is]. If I remove lines 2 and 3 (comment and DOCTYPE), I can load the test file. I spot-checked a few other graphs in the QuickGraph test suite and they all cause Graph# to crash, possibly with the same fix).

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- This file was written by the internal XML-Handler of Y-Files.-->
<!DOCTYPE graphml SYSTEM "http://www.graphdrawing.org/dtds/graphml.dtd">
<graphml>
<graph id="G">
<node id="n0"/>
<node id="n1"/>
<node id="n2"/>
<node id="n3"/>
<node id="n4"/>
<node id="n5"/>
<node id="n6"/>
<node id="n7"/>
<node id="n8"/>
<node id="n9"/>
<edge id="e0" source="n8" target="n0"/>
<edge id="e1" source="n8" target="n3"/>
<edge id="e2" source="n8" target="n4"/>
<edge id="e3" source="n8" target="n5"/>
<edge id="e4" source="n8" target="n6"/>
<edge id="e5" source="n3" target="n4"/>
<edge id="e6" source="n4" target="n5"/>
<edge id="e7" source="n5" target="n7"/>
<edge id="e8" source="n0" target="n1"/>
<edge id="e9" source="n0" target="n2"/>
<edge id="e10" source="n0" target="n9"/>
</graph>
</graphml>
WorkItem.Summary: Some QuickGraph tests may crash Graph#

Comments.Message: I think [workitem:8271] will solve this problem.
